reviewText: OK for this installment of Baki its a continuation of the tourney fights to crown the badest mofo out there, highlights are of course baki's fight with the wild man from the jungle, with a surprising out come. another great fight is the title brothers war, pits shinogi and korea (brothers) against each other for a touching almost painful fight to watch , were in the end brothers are reunited. so touching, also keep an eye out for grandpa in this disc, he proves its about brains in fighting not brawn(but it doesnt hurt) I am a fan of this series so if you want to get into it buy number 1 and go from there you won't be disapointed.
